title: Trump Goes Abroad Amid Escalating Russia Probe: A Closer Look | Sen. John McCain
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the scandals awaiting Donald Trump at home when he returns from his first foreign trip as president. (0:20)
Then, Seth talks to Senator John McCain about his role as a statesman in the Trump administration. (9:51)
In a podcast exclusive, Senator McCain then talks to producer Henry Melcher backstage about whether he prefers going on comedy programs or news programs. (21:26)
